item.title: Hey its me again
item.dc:creator: @i_pwnz_nubz i_pwnz_nubz
item.description:
@i_pwnz_nubz wrote:

how do i increase the exp of firemaking?

/*FIREMAKING*/ public boolean firemaking() { if (playerLevel[playerFiremaking] >= firemaking[1]) { if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMakingFire == false) { actionAmount++; sendMessage("You attemp to light a fire..."); OriginalWeapon = playerEquipment[playerWeapon]; OriginalShield = playerEquipment[playerShield]; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 590; playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; actionTimer = 5; if (actionTimer < 1) { actionTimer = 1; } setAnimation(0x2DD); IsMakingFire = true; } if (actionTimer == 0 && IsMakingFire == true) { addSkillXP((firemaking[2] * firemaking[3]), playerFiremaking); server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsSDelay[firemaking[4]] = server.itemHandler.MaxDropShowDelay + 1; CreateNewFire(); sendMessage("You light a fire."); playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon; OriginalWeapon = -1; resetAnimation(); IsMakingFire = false; resetFM(); } } else { sendMessage("You need "+firemaking[1]+" "+statName[playerFiremaking]+" to light these logs."); resetFM(); return false; } return true; }

Read full topic
